name: seemingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 appearing to be something, especially when this is not true: He remains confident and seemingly untroubled by his recent problems.
according to the facts that you know: The factory closure is seemingly inevitable. Seemingly, she's gone to live with another man.
